metadata.name: Important Scheduled Task Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects when adversaries try to stop system services or processes by deleting their respective scheduled tasks in order to conduct data destructive activities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM scheduled_job_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND metadata.event_code = 141 AND (contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\systemrestore\\\\sr')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\windows defender\\\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\bitlocker')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\windowsbackup\\\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\windowsupdate\\\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\updateorchestrator\\\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\exploitguard'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori'))))

output.summary: Detects when adversaries try to stop system services or processes by deleting their respective scheduled tasks in order to conduct data destructive activities
